title: Sampdoria sack manager Eusebio Di Francesco after losing six of their first seven Serie A matches
text:
Sampdoria has parted ways with coach Eusebio Di Francesco after losing six of their first seven Serie A matches of the season.

Sampdoria said on its website Monday that the decision was made by mutual consent.

Sampdoria are in last place in Serie A with just three points.

Sampdoria has parted ways with coach Eusebio Di Francesco after losing six of his first seven

Club president Massimo Ferrero said after Saturday's 2-0 loss at Hellas Verona that he would meet with Di Francesco on Sunday before making a decision on his future.

Sampdoria did not immediately announce a new coach.

But Italian media reported that Giuseppe Iachini is the favorite to replace Di Francesco.
description: Sampdoria has parted ways with coach Eusebio Di Francesco after losing six of its first seven Serie A matches of the season.  Sampdoria said that the decision was made by mutual consent.
